Name: Absolute Destruction
Description: Destroys the enemy with 5{0}% chance (Bosses and criminals are not destroyed)

Name: Absolute Zero
Description: Stuns the enemy for 3 secs with 2{0}% chance when attacking

Name: Adrenaline
Description: Transforms into an awakened state for 5{0} sec upon hearing the horn that signals the start of a wave

Name: Ancient Tombstone
Description: Summons a boulder at a random nearby location every 5 sec to obstruct the enemy's path for 3{0} sec

Name: Awakening
Description: Attack speed increases by 400{0}%, and attacks have a 3.5{1}% chance to deal additiona damage equal to 1.5{2}% of the enemy's max HP. Becomes exhauted for 5{3} seconds and cannot take any actions during the exhaustion.

Name: Boulder Fragment
Description: Projectiles deal 0.3 AoE DMG

Name: Careful Aim III
Description: Slows ATK SPD, but increases ATK range and fires powerful arrows

Name: Converged Might
Description: When Asura is summoned, it wields combined power of the Sealed Asur'as Head, Torso, Arms, and Legs, granting 200{0}% ATK, 2 ATK SPD, and 2 range. Only one Asura can exist on the player's field at a time. After summoning, it instantly eliminates all enemies on the field. (Excludes bosses and bounty targets)

Name: Dragon Roar
Description: Grants all units 100{0}% increase to their ATK

Name: Earthshattering strike
Description: Stuns the target for 2 sec with 25{0}% chance when attacking

Name: Excited Batting
Description: Gains 2 Gold upon landing a CRIT strike

Name: Fist of the Ancients
Description: Asura's attacks give damage to the target and enemies within a 1 range.

Name: Free-Flying Helictoper
Description: Capable of moving freely to other locations, but moving decreases performance, resulting in 10% reduced ATK SPD

Name: Golem Habits
Description: Attacks the nearest enemy

Name: Great Earthquake
Description: Causes a Great Earthquake every 10 strikes, dealing 200{0}% DMG to all enemies and stunning them for 2.5{1} sec

Name: Great Scallion Blade
Description: The scallion transforms into a massive blade, changing attacks to deal AoE with a range of 1.

Name: Growing Scallions
Description: Scalluck consumes gold to upgrade its scallions. If the upgrade fails, the stats will decrease.

Name: Light's Protection
Description: Grants monsters within range of 1, 50{0}% increase to their CRIT RATE and 7{1}% increase to their ATK SPD

Name: Magma Blast
Description: Every third attack, fires a projectile that deals an additional 300{0}% DMG

Name: Mega Special Bomb
Description: Surprise Mouse attacks enemies with a Mega Special Bomb. The bomb explodes upon collision, dealing damage within a 1.5 range

Name: Mind's Eye
Description: Master Cat swings a sword with their mind's eye with 9{0}% chance when attacking, dealing DMG equal to 500{1}% of the caster's ATK to enemies within their ATK range

Name: Minigun
Description: Rapidly attacks enemies with the Minigun. When switched to Rocket Launcher, Attack Speed is decreased by 50{0}%.

Name: Moneygrubber
Description: Increases ATK by 100{0} per 1 Gold

Name: Oni Hunt
Description: Unleases a red sword aura with 7{0}% chance when attacking, dealing additional damage equal to 3{1}% of all enemies' Max HP along its path.

Name: Orc's Fury
Description: Increases ATK, but targets a random enemy within range

Name: Overheat
Description: Increases DMG by 15{0}% each time the same enemy is attacked

Name: Persistence
Description: The skeleton continues attacking its target until the enemy dies.

Name: Power of Reclamation
Description: Enhance Asura with magic stones.

Name: Rank Promotion
Description: Rank rises every time 50 enemies are defeated. When the rank rises, CRIT DMG increases by 100{0}% and ATK SPD increases by 0.5{1}

Name: Revenge
Description: Prioritizes bosses and criminals and deals additional DMG

Name: Rocket Launcher
Description: Attacks enemies with the Rocket Launcher, prioritizing enemies with time bombs attached and dealing damage to all enemies within a 2 range.

Name: Shadow Strike
Description: Has a 3{0}% chance to absorb 1 soul and deal additional damage equal to 5{1}% of the enemy's max HP.

Name: Soul Absorbtion
Description: Attacks have a 8{0}% chance to absorb a soul.

Name: Soul Army
Description: Each time the number of Magic Stone Mining Slimes becomes a multiple of 5, it summons a soul that orbits nearby.

Name: Summon Shadow Lord
Description: Summoning [Shadow Lord] increases ATK SPD by 50{0}%, and ATK by 15{1}% per soul. [Shadow Lord] consumes souls to attack, dealing additional damage equal to 0.5{2}% of the enemy's max HP.

Name: The Only One
Description: Only one can exist on your field

Name: Thin Ice
Description: Continuously freezes the nearby ground to reduce the enemy's MOV SPD b 50{0}%

Name: Time Bomb
Description: Minigun has a 5{0}% chance to plant a time bomb, exploding after 5{1} seconds to deal 2{2}% of the target's max health as damage. It stuns all nearby enemies within a 1 range for 2 seconds.

Name: Transcendent Scalluck
Description: Scalluck transcends, increasing its attack range by 4.

Name: Treasure Chest
Description: The chest opens 60{0} sec after being summoned. The chest summons a random Demon God and grants 500{1} Gold and 50{2} Magic Stone(s). (Supreme Demon God excluded)

Name: Vroom Vroom Drink I
Description: Weakens ATK, but ATK SPD becomes incredibly fast

Name: Vroom Vroom Drink II
Description: Weakens ATK, but ATK SPD becomes incredibly fast

Name: Vroom Vroom Drink III
Description: Weakens ATK, but ATK SPD becomes incredibly fast

Name: Wave of Darkness
Description: The attack pierces the enemy and hits all enemies in the path

Name: Wind Voodoo
Description: Grants all units on the field 25{0}% increase to their ATK SPD
